trans-unit.source: An activity that supports compensation of its child activities.
trans-unit.target: Un'attività che supporta la compensazione delle relative attività figlio.

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity allows a developer to specify a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> activity that defines a long-running task that performs their core business logic.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity consente allo sviluppatore di specificare un <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>attività che definisce un'attività a esecuzione prolungata che esegue la logica di business principale.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also allows the developer to optionally specify a compensation and confirmation activity to schedule appropriate business logic in the event of errors or successful completion of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Consente inoltre allo sviluppatore di specificare un'attività di compensazione e conferma per pianificare la logica di business appropriata in caso di errori o completamento riuscito di <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: Compensation and confirmation of a CompensableActivity is invoked by using the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> returned by the CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: Compensazione e la conferma di CompensableActivity viene richiamato utilizzando il <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>restituito per l'attività CompensableActivity.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is an opaque, typed object returned as the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A> argument after successful completion of a CompensableActivity activity’s <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>è un oggetto opaco, tipizzato restituito come <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A>argomento dopo il completamento di un'attività di CompensableActivity <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A></xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activities to explicitly invoke confirmation and compensation of a CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>attività da richiamare in modo esplicito conferma e compensazione di un'attività CompensableActivity.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity can be composed in a nested hierarchical fashion in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity possono essere composte in una gerarchia annidata nel flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Compensation Programming Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Il modello di programmazione di compensazione](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'attività pianificata quando il <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> esegue.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è impostato in fase di esecuzione, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: L'attività pianificata quando il <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> esegue.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'attività pianificata quando l'attività viene annullata.

trans-unit.source: CancellationHandler can be used to specify custom cancelation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: CancellationHandler può essere usato per specificare la logica di annullamento personalizzata per <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.target: Se il valore è impostato in fase di esecuzione, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: L'attività pianificata quando l'attività viene annullata.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when compensation is performed on the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'attività pianificata quando viene eseguito il <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: CompensationHandler può essere usato per specificare la logica di compensazione personalizzata per <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.target: ConfirmationHandler può essere usato per specificare la logica di conferma personalizzata per <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>
